headline: What the Rally in Constellation Energy Means After Its $600 Million Nuclear Investment
summary: Thinking about what to do with your Constellation Energy shares, or maybe eyeing the stock for the first time? You are definitely not alone. Over the last year, Constellation Energy’s stock price has soared by an impressive 60.1%, and if you zoom out to the last three years, the returns are even more striking, at 292.6%. That kind of climb is enough to catch anyone’s attention, especially as broader market shifts such as the increasing demand for clean energy and grid reliability have played...
